gameDetails.name: Villainous Vikings (Second Edition): Ernie the Geek Promo
gameDetails.description:
"The bow of his Longship splits the water like the skulls of his countless victims. His reputation precedes him, causing panicked villagers to abandon the town to escape his wrath. From Greenland to Constantinople he is known as the scourge of mankind. Every corner of the known world fears the sight of his vengeful prow. Stepping onto shore, the ground trembles at the might of... Ernie the Geek?"

Expand your crew in this BoardGameGeek exclusive promo pack for Villainous Vikings 2nd Edition. You can now give four different Ernie captains control of your Longship in your continuing quest for gold, glory, and Valhalla. Each of the new Ernie captains gives a unique bonus that makes for a wild, unpredictable game.

Comes with four unique captains based on BGG's beloved mascot, Ernie the Geek.
